title: Steward

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Polish the crew's ship, granting all Crew members Roleblock, Redirect and Control immunity for the night. (1 use)
- Raise the team morale, granting all Crew members Astral visits for the night. (1 use)
- Wax the crew uniforms, making all Crew members appear as a random Town role tonight. (1 use)
- Wipe the floorboards, making all Crew kills clean their targets tonight. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
*I thought I was rid of it... But it came back. I can't let this cursed beast destroy the Town... or the Crew. I know what I have to do.*
- When you've used all four of your abilities, you'll succumb to the **Sunken Vassal**, mutilating your body along with another target of your choice and dealing an Unstoppable attack to both.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all main factions. ...*and make sure the **Sunken Vassal** is kept at bay...if only for a little longer.*

desc:
Post 2572
*I'm just a lowly steward, but I've seen things no man should see.*
